name: Starsiege: Deadzone
description:
Starsiege: Deadzone is a multiplayer corridor extraction shooter set in a dark sci-fi universe where humanity is on the brink of extinction. As space mercenaries, known as Raiders, players will team up with two others to explore the derelict stations taken over by sentient AI. As a Raider, your goal is to extract valuable weapons and resources for your faction. Players will customize a loadout and venture into procedurally generated ships making each match unique. Work alone or together to overcome the ship's deadly traps and defenses in order to escape. However, beware of the other Raiders seeking the same riches.

Key Features


  • Tactical PVP Combat: Use a variety of weapons, equipment, and ship hazards to take out other players and survive each mission. Plan your attacks and select the right gear to suit you and your team.

  • Procedurally Generated Ships: Each mission is a unique experience with a different layout to explore. The space stations are filled with deadly traps, defenses, and rival Raiders.

  • Hardcore Gameplay: Face a variety of dangerous enemies in each room, and be ready to retreat and find another path if necessary. With limited respawns every decision matters.

  • Dynamic Light & Darkness: Shoot out lights to create darkness and ambush enemies. Use your flashlight to prospect the ship’s darkest corners. The use of light and darkness is critical to your success or demise in The Deadzone.

  • High-Stakes Extraction: The ship is crumbling and time is running out. Find valuable resources and escape before it's too late, but beware - there are only enough escape pods for half of the players in each match. If you don't make it out, you'll lose everything.
